name: intrinsics::mir::UnwindTerminateReason
doc_adt: The reason we are terminating the process during unwinding.

VariantIdx(Some(0))-FieldIdx(None).name: Abi
VariantIdx(Some(0))-FieldIdx(None).doc: Unwinding is just not possible given the ABI of this function.

VariantIdx(Some(1))-FieldIdx(None).name: InCleanup
VariantIdx(Some(1))-FieldIdx(None).doc:
We were already cleaning up for an ongoing unwind, and a *second*, *nested* unwind was
 triggered by the drop glue.
